name: Mobipocket eBook
summary: A MOBI file is a digital book (eBook) saved in the proprietary MOBI format. It contains binary data that makes up an eBook (a book, magazine, scientific publication, etc.) and may incorporate DRM copyright protection to prevent copying or unauthorized viewing. Various eReaders, tablets, and software, including Calibre and Geometer Plus FBReader, support MOBI files.
